remarks: Convert an operation cancellation law to class notation.  (Contributed by NM, 20-Aug-1995.)
statement:
caovcan.1 $e |- C e. _V $.
caovcan.2 $e |- ( ( x e. S /\ y e. S ) -> ( ( x F y ) = ( x F z ) -> y = z ) ) $.
caovcan $p |- ( ( A e. S /\ B e. S ) -> ( ( A F B ) = ( A F C ) -> B = C ) ) $.
$d A x y z $.
$d B x y z $.
$d C x y z $.
$d F x y z $.
$d S x y z $.
